QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
In this economic downturn, are you looking for an additional passive income to supplement your full time job?  
 
We are seeking Internet influencers and marketers who can help us market our fitness classes to a larger community, and perhaps join in as well to embark on a path towards fitness. Contact us to find out more.
title: Seeking Fitness Influencers
